metadata.description:
This NFT is part of a charity collection initiated by blockchain startup Hibex in aid of Podari.Life, a charity helping children beat cancer.

Artwork by Daniil Zuev, a young digital artist from St. Petersburg. He works with social and charity projects for children, using Electrocardiographs and generative graphics as tools. He is a participant in such exhibitions as The Ethereal Eether by the Hermitage Museum, NFTzation by the art cluster Tavrida, Theatre of Digital Art in Dubai, Sovrisk#onstream in Museum Zaryadye, and many others.

With each purchase of this NFT on the primary and secondary markets, 50% of the total sales will be donated to Podari.Life to support the fund.

Each Primary market NFT buyer will be granted an invitation to the exclusive New Year's Eve charity dinner taking place on December 22, 2022, in Moscow.

To get the dinner invitation, please contact us at: info@charityforkids.ru

Event details: charityforkids.ru

Artists link: www.instagram.com/zuzya_art/
